snippet: Northern rebels and Salafist Islamists agreed to a cease-fire after weeks of fighting, the chairman of a Yemeni presidential committee said Monday.
abstract: Yahia Abu Issba, chairman of a Yemeni presidential committee, says that northern rebels and ultraconservative Salafist Islamists have agreed to a cease-fire after weeks of fighting.
lead_paragraph: Northern rebels and Salafist Islamists agreed to a cease-fire after weeks of fighting, the chairman of a Yemeni presidential committee said Monday.

headline.main: Yemen: Rivals Agree to a Truce

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
